quote: God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.
author: 2 Timothy 1:7

quote: Cultivate an attitude of happiness. Cultivate a spirit of optimism. Walk with faith.
author: President Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: If ye have faith ye hope for things which are not seen, which are true..
author: Alma 32:21

quote: We must be humble and willing to change.
author: Mosiah 27:25

quote: Believe in God.
author: Mosiah 4:9

quote: I cry unto my God in faith, and I know that he will hear my cry.
author: 2 Nephi 33:3

quote: Counsel with the Lord in all thy doings, and he will direct thee for good.
author: Alma 37:37

quote: Behold, I am a disciple of Jesus Christ, the Son of God.
author: 3 Nephi 5:13

quote: Have ye inquired of the Lord?
author: 1 Nephi 15:8

quote: Be an instrument of the Lord.
author: Words of Mormon 1:7

quote: Jesus Christ knows our sins and offers us His gospel to help us overcome them.
author: Mosiah 3:13

quote: The knowledge of a Savior shall spread throughout every nation, kindred, tongue, and people.
author: Mosiah 3:20

quote: The natural man is an enemy to God.

author: 2 Nephi 31:20

quote: Salvation is only in and through the name of Christ.
author: Mosiah 3:17

quote: If we are humble and serve others, the Lord will strengthen us.
author: Ether 12:27

quote: Lay hold upon the word of God.
author: Helaman 3:29

quote: We cannot serve two masters.
author: 3 Nephi 13:24

quote: I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world.
author: Matthew 28:20

quote: O how great the plan of our God!
author: 2 Nephi 9:13
